mapper.sql: id, dept_name, goods_price, type, type_name, note, date, incometype_type, isDeleted, store_id, price_name
mapper.insert:
insert into initialize_info
id,
dept_name,
goods_price,
type,
type_name,
note,
date,
incometype_type,
isDeleted,
store_id,
price_name,

mapper.update:
update initialize_info
dept_name = #{deptName,jdbcType=CHAR},
goods_price = #{goodsPrice,jdbcType=INTEGER},
type = #{type,jdbcType=CHAR},
type_name = #{typeName,jdbcType=CHAR},
note = #{note,jdbcType=CHAR},
date = #{date,jdbcType=CHAR},
incometype_type = #{incometypeType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
isDeleted = #{isdeleted,jdbcType=INTEGER},
store_id = #{storeId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update initialize_info set dept_name = #{deptName,jdbcType=CHAR}, goods_price = #{goodsPrice,jdbcType=INTEGER}, type = #{type,jdbcType=CHAR}, type_name = #{typeName,jdbcType=CHAR}, note = #{note,jdbcType=CHAR}, date = #{date,jdbcType=CHAR}, incometype_type = #{incometypeType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, isDeleted = #{isdeleted,jdbcType=INTEGER}, store_id = #{storeId,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select i.id, d.dept_name, i.goods_price, i.type, i.type_name, i.note, i.date, i.incometype_type, i.isDeleted, i.store_id, i.price_name from initialize_info i left join dept_info d ON i.dept_name=d.dept_id where i.isDeleted = 0 and i.store_id = #{params.storeId}
